metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1426 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Puppet Labs Facter 1.6.0 through 2.4.0 allows local users to obtains sensitive Amazon EC2 IAM instance metadata by reading a fact for an Amazon EC2 node.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

facter - 2.4.4-1
libfacter3.10.0 - 2.4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: facter package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.4-1').
